content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1716620142581{background: #e3eef6 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/kanakku.jpg?id=1763) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1756″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]

Inventory Made Effortless

Kanakku keeps your stock in sync.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Live Demo” style=”custom” custom_background=”#7539ff” custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fkanakku-web.dreamstechnologies.com%2Flogin|title:Kanakku|target:_blank” el_class=”me-3″][vc_btn title=”Visit Product Site” style=”custom” custom_background=”#7539ff” custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fkanakku.uk%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:_blank”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1718074941818{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTVCZmxleHlfYnJlYWRjcnVtYiU1RA==[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″ el_class=”reverse-col ticklist”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1765″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

About Kanakku

Kanakku is a robust Invoice and Billing Management Application, expertly designed to streamline and automate the entire invoicing lifecycle for businesses. This advanced software solution is tailored to simplify the creation, distribution, and precise management of invoices and bills.

  • Automated Invoicing: Kanakku streamlines invoicing with automated generation post-sales, minimizing errors and maximizing efficiency.
  • Customizable Templates:  Create personalized invoices with Kanakku’s customizable templates, enhancing brand identity and professionalism.
  • Seamless Integration: Kanakku seamlessly integrates inventory management and real-time invoice tracking, optimizing organizational efficiency and financial oversight.

 [/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Visit Product Site” style=”custom” custom_background=”#7539ff” custom_text=”#ffffff” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fkanakku.uk%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:_blank”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1716619165047{background-color: #f5f7fa !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Features

Effortlessly manage invoices and inventory with Kanakku’s comprehensive automation and integration features

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Customize it Now” style=”custom” custom_background=”#7539ff” custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdreamstechnologies.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Automated Invoicing

Upon completion of a sale and order processing, Kanakku seamlessly generates invoices based on transaction details, eliminating the need for manual invoice creation. This automation not only saves time but also reduces the risk of errors, ensuring smooth business operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Customizable Invoice Templates

Kanakku provides fully customizable invoice templates that can be tailored to match your brand identity. Incorporate your logo, company details, and personalized messages to create professional-looking invoices that leave a lasting impression on your customers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Seamless Integration

By integrating inventory management with invoicing, Kanakku ensures that all relevant data, including product details, quantities, and pricing, is accurately reflected in invoices. This seamless flow of information enhances consistency across sales documentation, minimizing discrepancies and errors[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”30″ el_class=”colbox”][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Invoice Tracking

With Kanakku, you can easily track the status of invoices from creation to payment receipt. This real-time visibility enables efficient management of outstanding payments and enhances organizational efficiency[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Financial Reporting

Kanakku’s invoicing feature contributes to comprehensive financial reporting by providing insights into sales revenue, outstanding invoices, and payment trends. Armed with this data, businesses can make informed decisions and optimize their cash flow management strategies for long-term success.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”colbox” width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Integration

Kanakku offers seamless integration with CRM systems, allowing businesses to synchronize customer data with their invoicing processes. This integration enables users to access customer information directly from within the invoicing platform, streamlining communication and enhancing customer service. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1742186957910-f44e1dbf-af70-5″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”greybg”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

We harness a diverse array of advanced technologies to craft innovative solutions that drive digital transformation and shape the future.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”tophdr” css=”.vc_custom_1716619219032{background: #191f49 url(https://dreamstechnologies.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/bottom-ctn-1.jpg?id=1712) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” gap=”35″][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Stay ahead with Kanakku – Your Invoicing Companion

[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Get in Touch!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#ffffff” custom_text=”#0b124a” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_type=”material” i_icon_material=”vc-material vc-material-arrow_forward” css_animation=”none” add_icon=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fdreamstechnologies.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
